column4: I'm having problem with latest linux ati driver. I'm using kernel 2.6.15-17-686. I have been able to install the driver as usual, but this time it won't load properly. DMESG says fglrx "taints the kernel". What does that mean?
2.6.15-18 is newest kernel and please dapper needs to go to #ubuntu+1
Ok, but actually maybe you can translate the meaning of "taints a kernel"?
if you have themes use that if not use gnome control panel (dont remember what one kde uses
ok I found control control center, I guess it's this one
